text: Hagi ana ne'mo'ma kesinigeno, hosi afu agumpima mago mago vahe'ma manitere hu'nesnage'za tare hosi afutrema taragoteterema hu'zama ne-esnage'za, donki afu'ene kemoli afutamimofo agumpima vahe'ma mani'nezama avazuhumpi huza ne-esageno'ma nezmagesuno'a naza fore hugahifi agesa anteno antahi so'e hino.
